item.title: Building Least-Privilege IAM Roles with IAM Access Analyzer
item.description: A hands-on deep dive into using IAM Access Analyzer to detect, refine, and enforce least-privilege IAM policies in AWS. Includes CLI examples, Terraform integration, and AWS-recommended practices.

item.title: AWS Security Checklist 2025: 10 Critical Steps to Secure Your Cloud
item.description: A clean and practical checklist of 10 security controls every AWS user should apply in 2025—from S3 bucket lockdown to IAM hardening, logging, and real-time alerts.

item.title: IAM Users Are Dead: Modern AWS Access Control for 2025
item.description: In 2025, IAM users are no longer best practice in AWS. This guide shows how to migrate to secure, modern alternatives like IAM Identity Center, STS, and OIDC federation.

item.title: 5 Critical AWS Security Misconfigurations (2025 Edition) – How to Find & Fix Them
item.description: Still leaving your S3 buckets public or IAM policies overly broad? This guide covers five high-impact AWS security mistakes—and exactly how to eliminate them in your environment today.
